label: Starting - My business is just starting and has been operational for less than 3 years.
Growing - My business is growing rapidly. We are getting more clients and accepting more projects.
Established - My business is well-established. We have matured in the market, have stable operations, and have a set client base.
Decline - My business is currently experiencing a decline. We are losing revenue and have negative cash flow.
Sunset - My business is gearing up for exit. There is a chance the business might close if situations do not improve.
